TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISuppress implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Lang.Annotation.IAnnotation, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Use this annotation on test classes or test methods that should not be included in a test suite.

remarks.para: Use this annotation on test classes or test methods that should not be included in a test suite. If the annotation appears on the class then no tests in that class will be included. If the annotation appears only on a test method then only that method will be excluded.
